Primary Instructors.About: Professor I-Son Grace Ng is devoted to the synthetic biology, genetic and enzymatic engineering, which to apply in bioenergy and biorefinery. She is currently teaching in Department of Chemical Engineering. She has over 6 years’ experience in iGEM. As the PI of iGEM_NCKU Tainan, she really expects the iGEMers grow up and become the ace in Synthetic Biology.
Primary Instructors.Name: Prof. 吳意珣 I-Son Ng
Primary Instructors.學歷: 國立成功大學化學工程　博士
Primary Instructors.現職: 成功大學化工系助理教授

Primary Instructors.Name: Prof. 蔡美玲 Mei-Ling Tsai
Primary Instructors.學歷: 美國密西根大學毒物學　博士
Primary Instructors.現職: 成大醫學院生理所副教授

Instructors.Name: Prof. Ching-Yi Yeh
Instructors.學歷: 劍橋大學第二語言教育研究哲學　碩士

Instructors.Name: Prof. 張嘉修
Instructors.學歷: 美國加州大學Irvine分校化工暨生化　博士
Instructors.現職: 成功大學化工系特聘教授

Advisers.Name: 吳博仁 Eric, Po-Jen Wu
Advisers.About: The game player in biological system. In NCKU_Tainan iGEM team, I want to promote the linkage from theory to the real working system in organism.

Wet Lab.Name: 汪維萱 Wei-Hsuan Wang
Wet Lab.About: I love challenges and doing crazy things. iGEM gives me a chance to apply what I learned from the textbook, and also allows me to explore a new field, synthetic biology. It allows us to turn lots of impossible things to reality and deal with the big issues in our world. Joining iGEM also enables me to make amazing friends, and I love to be together with them. As a team we try everything new and conquer the problems together.

Dry Lab.Name: 陳書宇Shu-Yu Chen
Dry Lab.About: Major in physics and interested in medicine, working on quantum information in college, hope to solve medical problems with new physics. I participate in iGEM to meet new people who are also care about medicine and interdisciplinary.

Dry Lab.Name: 蔡孟軒Meng Hsuan Tsai
Dry Lab.About: iGEM creates opportunities for students with goodwill to join and make great things even better. We could try to view what a problem in the real world is and also work as a team player to solve it. I not only have a deeper insight about synthetic biology, but also focus on my own discipline. That’s why I am so addicted to iGEM, to apply everything that we learn as a team.

Dry Lab.Name: 張宏卿Hung-ching Chang
Dry Lab.About: Bimajor in Mathematic and Statistic. Use the power of math to improve the harm brought by technology is my dream. And iGEM let me take a step foward to my dream.

Dry Lab.Name: 高紹軒
Dry Lab.About: As one of the iGEM NCKU Tainan initiator, I'm glad to enjoy this synthetic biology journey. From Wet Lab to Dry Lab, and also Human Pratice, I participated every singel part in the begining. Finally, I worked in Dry Lab - Hardware Design. As a iGEMer, I'm proud to contribute abilities to iGEM NCKU (somehow we function like synthetic bio!) and wish to enrich my best team till the end of journey.

Information Technology.Name: Jingfei Yang
Information Technology.About: One of my hobbies is to make new friends. Besides, I love the atmosphere of teamwork Specially while they are struggling on the same goal and making big process. I have lots of experience about website and algorithm programming. Hope that I can make contributions on iGEM's website and data analysis.

Information Technology.Name: 林協霆 Tim, Hsieh Ting Lin

Human Practice.Name: 侯智薰
Human Practice.About: Major is not a matter, but thinking and action out of the frame is the matter. iGEM is the long experiment to see the potential of  interdiscipline and what we can do. As a multipotentialite, I like to try new things, learn from observation and make ideas reality. All the stories begin with a choice.

Human Practice.Name: 劉珈君
Human Practice.About: I am a person who would like to face the challenge , this is why i choose to join the first year of iGEM NCKU_Tainan

Human Practice.Name: 蕭荷青
Human Practice.About: Passionate about MSE but would like to indulge in Industrial Design too. Am a girl from a small town in M'sia came to Taiwan to pursue her dreams. Always believe that there's a tenuous link between Life and Science where a slight touch leads to a brilliant sparkle ! Therefore I join iGEM as to widen my view to a whole new field that I had never seen before at the same time meeting great people with the same vision.
